comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on May 15, 2022, 07:57:12 PMHopium ?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDDRBrBhsBsThere will be no repeg and Do Kwon has already been outed as a scammer and is under criminal investigation in several countries. His developers migrated to $NEAR and Candle labs and these projects have grants programs set up for developers. NEAR for example is giving away millions of dollars and $CNDL is giving away a piece of the protocol itself, a stake in the chain.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: There is small chance for something like this to happen. I get that Do Kwon needs to say stuff like this because he is the project owner and he needs to try to keep the hope up, the more help he gets the easier it would be for him, he would prefer it if people would buy it and make it repegged themselves without him doing anything, so he is trying to make it liked more and more and trying to gain some attention.But, we all know that it won't work that way, we all know that it is going to be a problem. So, we should be focusing on the reality and not the dream he has and not the thing he wants us to do because that won't be working.

comments.author: diminizio
comments.body: the talk with Do Kwon I think was about how the UST can drop lower so it's out of a stable coin, but they don't present or plan on re-recovering or redeveloping the UST. I think it is precisely with the destruction of the old LUNA ecosystem that they will try to build a new project, starting all over from scratch to build a project that can fix the shortcomings of the previous LUNA.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on May 15, 2022, 07:57:12 PMHopium ?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDDRBrBhsBsHopium maybe for everyone that is still holding on to UST at the moment or to Terra Luna. First of all we need to see if the re-peg is really happening and to be honest i highly doubt that. At the moment UST is at around 0.05 USD per token so i there is a huge buy pressure needed in order to get the price back up to 1 USD. If they are trying to re-peg it to the USD price via some other kind of mechanism or a relaunch of the token or something like that than this would be also bad for everyone that is still holding UST because then their old UST are worthless or not worth that much.Even if the re-peg works i think there is still a lot of trust that has been lost and will be very hard to get back.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: I don't know, many investors have lost trust on Do Kwon already. On the contrary, I don't think that UST can re-peg just like that. The question is who is willing to buy it at this price and hope to make money in the future? Investors are not that dumb to make the same mistakes again.The damage has been done already, and it's time for him to face the music as the South Korean government is after him because of the massive lost of investors on his project.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: If this information is true then Kwon and his Terra team are getting it all wrong, it won’t thing for a project to have a failed program and it’s another thing for them to accept that they have failed, I think Terra right now needs to accept that they have failed with UST and start to count their loses, they need to push forward and the way forward is letting go of their failed stable coin and channeling their focus to their coin Luna, I believe Luna has a strong chances of survival than UST does.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: I very much doubt that, he might just fork the current UST and creates a new ones, recovering back the current UST definitely gonna requires tremendous capitals and I doubt he gonna do that.regardless even if he did, I doubt anyone still gonna stick with UST considering its just better sticking with other similar altcoin like USDT, USDC and BUSD that hasn't disappointed its holders ever.so basically even if they did recover UST back to its former state, most of holders has already lost their faith.

comments.body: Frankly I tend to lose faith in the LUNA/UST project. for me personally, don't really trust their project anymore, after losing some of my savings when investing in LUNA or any other blockchain network that includes the terra ecosystem! comments.author: tygeade
comments.body: Quote from: Len Saldua on May 15, 2022, 07:57:12 PMHopium ?https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xDDRBrBhsBsAny coin out there that we can see today do not deserve all of your money. Do not put all of your life savings or anything like that into just coin. Of course there could be some stuff where it requires you to invest bigger amount than usual, but not all, never all of it.I personally feel like this needs to be written everywhere, lately binance started to ask questions like "are you sure you are withdrawing for right reasons" and warn everyone of fake places and scammers and all of that. But, they are forgetting the golden "do not put all of your money into just one place" thing and that is needed for everyone. If you are doing that, and then it crashes like Luna, you kind of deserved it.
